name: observability-sweep
description: Identify missing logs/metrics in delegation, cancel, and workflow suggestion flows; propose additions.

steps.title: Trace critical paths
steps.description: Review delegation start/cancel, workflow suggestion, and SSE streaming paths; map current logging/metrics.

steps.title: Find gaps
steps.description: List missing logs/metrics (latency, errors, cancels, parse failures, retries) and where to add them.

steps.title: Recommend instrumentation
steps.description: Propose concrete log statements/fields and metric names with cardinality guidance.
